rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0001
rows.name: Right then, I want to request a mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0003
rows.name:
The Nelson Team, who were installing a Data Probe,
have lost contact with us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0003_02
rows.name: I want to ask you to search for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0005
rows.name: Were they attacked by native creatures?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Don't know the details, but
Nelson's team had a Doll, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0007
rows.name: I wouldn't think they'd go down that easily, but...[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Either way, seems best
to go to the location and check.[ST:wait ]
